description: In many cultures, old people are valued for their advice and guidance on life's decisions. In this story, a group of young people get tired of consulting their elders and decide to kill all the old people in the village.

title: Wankoko ni waigongolo
description: Wankoko ni waigongolo baali n'omukwano ogw'okusinganwa. Lwali lulala wankoko yasungughala inho kuba yasubwa okukola ekintu ekyobusiru.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Hennetjie en Wurmpie
description: Hennetjie en Wurmpie is vriende. Hulle besluit om sokker te speel om te bepaal wie die beste is.
author: Tanja Pouwels

title: Nakiranda ku isomero
description: Olufumo luno olunhuma lusikiriza era luwaga abazaire era na abana abasubira okutandiika eisomero.
author: Charles Eramaga

title: I learnt a lesson
description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.
author: African Storybook

title: Namukhaywa
description: Gorko gooɗom no abba rewɓe 6, imo wi'a, o riiwan deekiiko nde danyaay mo ɓiɗɗo gorko. Debbo on danyii funeeɓe, debbo e gorko, janngu taariki on heɓa paamaa ko tokki.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Les Bananes De Grand-Mère
description: La petite fille est curieuse, lorsqu'elle regarde sa grand-mère faire mûrir les bananes. Mais l'endroit où la grand-mère conserve les bananes est secret à la grande déception de sa petite-fille. Combien de temps faudra-t-il à la petite-fille pour découvrir le secret de grand-mère?
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Hoender en Duisendpoot
description: Hoender en Duisendpoot het 'n baie mededingende vriendskap. Eendag verloor Hoender. Sy word toe so kwaad dat sy iets leliks aanvang.
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: Mate Kaŋ Annoori Te Ga Kolŋay Faaba
description: Hayno to, hari ga gaabu. Annoori ma hari jaw gumo. a ka bangu ga ne nga ga hari haŋ, isa bisa nd'a. kala kaŋ kolŋay na a faaba. Mate no a te ga gomno wo bana?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ingokho nende Likongolo
description: Ingokho nedne Likongolo bali abalina. Inyanga ndala,  ingokho yasinyikha muno khulwa okhushilwa nende likongolo,  niyakhola eshindu shio obuyingwa.
author: Achesa Makhambala

title: Nakiranda aja kutandiika ku isomero
description: Emboozi eno edwadwamiriza era yaiza mu bazaire n'abaana amaani abo abadhuuba okutandiika okusoma.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Namukhaywa
description: Wani mutum da ɗiyanshi shidda ƴan mata. Yana yi ma matarshi barazanar rabuwa da ita idan ba ta aifi ɗa namiji ba. Matar ta aifi ɗiya biyu tawaye,  mace da namiji,  karanta labarin don ka samu ƙarin bayani.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Má 'ɨ́ Àzɨ́nɨ Àkú Àma Vɨ́lé Rɨ̀
description: Á'dɨ́kó ‘dɨ̀rɨ e'yó nze e'yó ágúpíámvá àzɨ́nɨ nɨ́ fʉ̀zʉ́ acízʉ́ 'bá àkú àzɨ́ èrɨnɨ́ nìlé kʉnɨá 'dɨ̀yɨ be nɨ mà drìá.
author: Alice Ojobiru

title: Nakitto Furo Lokkol
description: Deede wo-ne ga zankey zuga lokkol cawo do haray
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Bananaaje Maamiyo Debbo
description: Suka debbo on no tawree hiinyu, hiinyu wakkati  maamiiko debbo ɓenndinta bananaaje ɗen. Ammaa nokku to maamiyo debbo on reenata bananaaje ɗen no laatani taaniiko debbo on sirri nder mettorgal ɓernde. Wakkatiiji foti taaniyo debbo on haandi heɓa faa yi'ita sirri maamiyo debbo on?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: الدجاجة والدودة
description: كانت الدجاجة والدودة أصدقاء، لكنهم كانوا يتنافسون دائماً مع بعضهما البعض. في يوم من الأيام، قرروا لعب كرة القدم لمعرفة من هو أفضل لاعب
author: Abrar Wafa

title: Fanna
description: Kwa laa, ba ferowa arakkuye.Kamunju tada konga cambənniya, tia farji cəne cittariyi. Kamudə, kawuwa  fero-a tada-a cambo. Lawardǝa təgəmbo kəranəmiya, awo wakkajidəa nonəmi.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ingokho Nende Likongolo
description: Lukano lwe ingokho nende likongolo.
author: Khabukoshe ASb Team

title: Ayabar Kaka
description: Yarinya tana mamakin yadda kakarta take nana ayaba? Amma wurin da kakarta take adana ayabar sirri ne. Kuma yarinyar ba ta ji daɗin haka ba. Yaushe ne yarinyar za ta san sirrin kakar tata?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Faati No Janngirde
description: Taariiki oo no walla sukaaɓe ɓen njaha janngirde.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Mbola Yaka Yefubelu
description: Mbola yetuna yefubelu iya mwamusipili wakwa lihalimu.
author: Limbali Muyendekwa

title: Huku ne Zongororo
description: Huku na Zongororo vaive shamwari. Asi viagara vachiita makwikwi. Nerimwe zuva vakafunga kutamba nhabvu vachida kuona kuti shasha ndiani.
author: Precious  Gumbo

title: Namukhaywa
description: Hadithi ya mwnamme na mkewe aliyemzalia watoto wasichana pekee. Anamwonya mkewe kuwa akimzaa mtoto msichana tena atamuua lakini iwapo atamzalia mvulana atamwaandalia karamu.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: O Frango E O Gongolo
description: História do Frango e do Gongolo (nível 4), adaptada para o nível 1.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Adìyẹ Àti Ọ̀ọ̀kùn
description: Ìtan Adìyẹ àti Ọ̀ọ̀kùn.
author: Ṣẹ́gun Ṣóẹ̀tán

title: Faji-a Bulduwa-A
description: Faji-a sawaanju-a curo dərrero bikkero lejai. Faji fakkyenniya, cidiya kəskayen boyen. Kənəmmin fayenniya, bulduwa tia dirijane kəljana, awi cəde ngərəmji?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ayawa Kakaye
description: Sa kaanju awaya cəbbafiya, fero ganadə ndoro cədi. Amma na kaadə awaya gərajidəa nojinnidəro karwunju kuttu. Sawi fero ganadə asər kaadəye noji?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Mbone and Akinyi
description: It is a story about two girls.
author: Esther Mutheu

title: Namukwaya
description: Olugero lw'omusajja eyatiisa mukyala we okumuta olw'okuzaala nga abana abawala bokka, naye n'amusubiza akabaga bwali muzalira omwana omulenzi. Omukyala bwe yagenda ew'omuzaalisa, yazaala balongo. Zuula omukyala kiki kye yadako okukola!
author: Robert Ssebukyu

title: Nkuku, Joongola
description: Nkuku a joongola bakali acilongwe cakuzundana. Bumwi buzuba Inkuku yakaciswa moyo cakuti yakacita cintu cibi kumweenzinyina.
author: Vision Milimo

title: (Colour-in) Counting cabbages
description: Colour-in storybook. A maths story about counting and sharing. (This storybook was made possible by funding from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Penelope Smith

title: Maiũ Ma Sũsũ
description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.  Where grandma stores the bananas to ripen remains top secret to the disappointment of her grandchild. But how long does it take before the grandchild discovers grandma's secret?
author: Anna Kula

title: Mbuya naTsuro
description: Iyi inyaya inoitika pakati pevamwe mbuya pavanoshanyira mwanasikana wavo mhiri kwerwizi.
author: Lilian Chaminuka

title: Mukhaye
description: Lukano lwomusetsa uwarisarisa umukhasi weewe uwasaalatsaka bakhana bonyene,ari kaane amukhonye inga wasaliile umukhana ukundi,ari nenga wamusaaliile umusinde alimukholeela kamayiiya.Umukhasi watsya womukangi usaalisa wasaala babaana bakhwaana.Bona sisyela kho.
author: Fabian Wakholi

title: Mulongo en Die Hiënas
description: Mulongo het na die woud gegaan om haar vriende te ontmoet. Sy het die verkeerde afdraai gevat en verdwaal. Mulongo het geloop totdat sy moeg geraak het en aan die slaap geraak onder 'n boom. Sy het wakker geword toe dit alreeds donker was en was omring deur hiënas. Hoe sal sy weer veilig by die huis kom?
author: Desiré Eybers

title: Nkuku Na Bongololo
description: Nkuku na bongololo anali abwenzi. Koma nkuku inakalipa cifukwa inaluza mumasowela ndipo inacita cintu copanda nzelu.
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Gweno Kodi Ongongolo
description: Gweno kodi Ongongolo jo bedo gi mere manya pyemi. Ndelo acel Gweno oyido nicegini gi tweyo munyo go otimo gimoro ma miŋo swa.
author: Hellen Alowo

title: Fun with Grammar
description: This resource explores how to use games to teach English grammar.

title: Mulongo and the Hyenas
description: Mulongo went into the forest to meet her friends. She took the wrong turn and got lost. Mulongo walked until she was tired, and fell asleep under a tree. She woke  when it was dark, and hyenas were gathering around her. How will she get home safely?
author: Sarah Nangobi

title: Namwima
description: oluῃayo lw'omusinde omwene muhasi owamusaalira bahaana boῃene ,amutiisa ati singa  asala omuhaana obundi wahumwita aya wahuhola embaga singa  amusaalira  owe hisaani. Omuhasi  atiina  ew'omusaalisa nga asaala rongo.yendulirisa hiina ehigaloosaho ohuhola.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: Ndizi za Bibi
description: Msichana mdogo anatazama na kudadizi namna bibi yake anavyotayarisha kuziweka ndizi ili ziive. Anakoziweka ndizi inabaki siri kubwa kwa huyu msichana anaudhika na jambo hilo. Je,  inachukuwa muda gani kabla msichana yule kuitambua siri ya bibi?
author: Peter Chege

title: Old woman and Hare
description: A story about what happens to an old woman when she goes to visit her daughter on the other side of the river.
author: Sylvestre Ntabajyana

title: Ons tel koolkoppe
description: 'n Wiskundestorie oor tel en deel. (Hierdie storieboek is deur finansiering van die Oppenheimer-gedenktrust moontlik gemaak.).
author: Anita  Dall

title: Dyslexia
description: This resource gives tips on recognizing and helping students with dyslexia.

title: Water Pollution
description: This reading describes water pollution.

title: Matter and Chemical Change
description: This resource explains how to interpret chemical names and formulas from compounds.

title: Slope - A Measure of the Steepness of a Line
description: This worksheet explores how to calculate the slope of a line.

title: Umukecuru Na Bakame
description: Iyi nkuru iravuga uko byagendekeye umukecuru ubwo yari agiye gusura umukobwa we wari utuye hakurya y'uruzi.
author: Sylvestre Ntabajyana

title: Chicken and Millipede
description: Chicken and Millipede have a very competitive friendship. One day Chicken gets so cross about losing that she does something very silly.
author: Winny Asara

title: Mulongo Et Les Hyènes
description: Mulungo va dans la forêt pour jouer avec ses amis. Elle se perd et s'endort dans seule sous un arbre. Elle se réveille entourée de hyènes, comment va-t-elle pouvoir leur échapper?
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Counting cabbages
description: A maths story about counting and sharing. (This storybook was made possible by funding from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Penelope Smith

title: Namukwaya
description: Olugero lw'omusaadha eyatiisa mukazi ghe okumwita olw'okuzaala abaana abaghala.
author: Isaac Mapiti

title: Nilipata Funzo
description: Msichana mdogo anadadisi anavyomtazama bibi akitayarisha kuzifukia ndizi ili ziwe mbivu.
author: African Storybook

title: Ukubala amakhabitjhi
description: Indatjana yeembalo yokubala nokwabelana. (This storybook was made possible by funding from the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: La Poule Et Le Millepatte
description: La poule et le millepatte sont toujours en compétition l'un avec l'autre. Un jour la poule en a tellement assez de perdre qu'elle fait quelque-chose de vraiment stupide.
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Mulongo E Bu'I
description: Mulungo e higiraaɓe muuɗum njehii pijoyii nder ladde sukkunde nden. O majji, o ɗanii kanko tan ley lekki. Ko o fini, o tawii bu'i no pilii mo, noye o waɗata ko hisa ɗi?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Namukhaywa
description: Enkatiní ená nalimú olpayíán otoíuo enkítok intóyie aké, néíture ajokí óre peê eigíl aíú entíto néar metúa, káke óre peê eíú olayíóni náa kéítobíraki ósírúa. Néísik inâ kítok aló aikí enetíi enkáítóyíóní, néiu ilmáo. Ísumá peê iyíólou ajó káa nátaasé.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Nayiga Essomo
description: Omuwala omuto yali ayagala nnyo okumanya ng'era yetegereza JjaJja we nga ayengeza amenvu.
author: Nalukwago Joviah

title: Omukazi omukaire era ni Wakayima
description: Olufumo luno lugema ku byatuuka ku mukazi omukaire bweyaja okucalira mughalaghe kubutuuma mwiga.
author: John Kasiti

title: Mangaphi amakhaphetshu?
description: Ibali lezibalo elingokubala nokwabelana. (Le ncwadi yamabali ibe nempimelelo ngenxa yenkxaso yemali efunyenwe kwiOppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Bulelwa  Nokele

title: Dede Ma A'Bua
description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.  Where grandma stores the bananas to ripen remains top secret to the disappointment of her grandchild. But how long does it take before the grandchild discovers grandma's secret?
author: Saidi Omar Dramani

title: Mchungaji
description: Hadithi inahusu mchungaji na shida alizo nazo. Soma uone anachofanya.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Mulongo Da Kuraye
description: Mulungo ta tafi cikin daji da abokanta. Ta yi ɓatan kai kuma ta kwana ƙasan wani icce. Da ta falka,  sai ta samu kanta tsakar kuraye. Ƙaƙa za ta ceton kanta?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Namukhaywa
description: Iyani ekoi lo kidiama ekile lo edoi aberu keng ng'isapa bon. Na kaneni abu kichichikak ng'esi atamar kaari aria kidou apese ache nabo. Abu nabo tolimok aberu ng'ina atamar asubakini ng'akinumnumet arai kidou idia nisapat. Abu aberu tolot naberu nakesudounon ng'aberu sodi kimu ng'ide ng'iarei. King'olik tokona ng'akiro na esidiunosi.
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Poulet Et Mille-Pattes
description: Poulet et Mille-pattes sont amis mais sont toujours en compétition. Un jour, Poulet est tellement mécontent de perdre qu'il  fait quelque chose de très stupide.
author: Nathalie Hecker

title: Mulongo na Fisi
description: Mulongo alikwenda msituni kukutana na marafikize. Alipotea kwa sababu alifuata njia tofauti. Mulongo alitembea hadi akachoka na kulala chini ya mti. Alipoamka,  ilikuwa usiku na fisi walikuwa wakimzunguka wakitaka kumla. Je,  angeendaje nyumbani salama?
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Dede Vile A'Bua Ri
description: Zámvá gǎkányaá rʉ́ rɨ̀ 'bà àvá àlʉ  'ɨ́mà ìdî nɨ nèzʉ à'bʉ́á otʉ̂rɨá 'bàzʉ́ nɨzʉ́. Nènɨ́ pàrí dèdé nɨ́ à'bʉ́á 'bazʉ́ nɨzʉ́ rɨ̀ kʉ. Èrɨ nga sâ 'du ngòpɨ́ ká zámvá ndê rɨ nɨ̀ nga pàrí 'ɨ́mà dèdè nɨ à'bʉ́á 'bàzʉ rɨ̀ nɨ ndò?
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Siyakwazi ukubala
description: Indaba emayelana ngokubala nokwabelana. (Ukuba khona kwale ndaba kube yimpulelo ngokuxhaswa ngabakwa Oppenheimer Memorial Trust.).
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Dineo
description: Dineo le monna wa gagwe Malepa ba nale barwadi ba le barataro. Malepa o tota a batla morwa. Fa Dineo a belega mawelana a mosimane le mosetsana, o ne a fitlha ngwana wa mosetsana mme a tsaya fela mosimane go ya gae. Mawelana a gola ka matshelo a a farologaneng mme ka letsatsi lengwe ba a kopana. A ba tla itse nnete?
author: Lorato Trok

title: Teret
description: The story is about a shepherd.
author: Beza

title: Gortogal E Kaakatal
description: Wakkati  fuu  gortogal ngal e kaakatal no gaabonndira. Nyannde gooɗom, ngam gortogal ngal yiɗaa waasude wune nder gaabonndirol ngol, ngal waɗii huunde hallunde gom.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Kubara Amashu
description: Agakuru k'imibare kubijyanye no kubara no guhuza.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Kamarofu Ka Kuukhu
description: Khakhaana khaheentselesa naabi nga khalolelela kuukhu wakho nga n'an'goonan'goona khuurobisa kamarofu. Ne isi kuukhu abiikha kamarofu ako, shili shiifwo she shimoonyo she angaaki, shaakila shaabirisa khaakhaana akho buubi naabi. Ne shayila mbuka shiina umwitsukhulu uyo khuumanya shiifwo she shimoonyo isho?
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Mulongo N'Empisi
description: This is a story of a young girl, Mulongo who went into the forest to meet her friends. However, she failed to find the path her friends had used. She took the wrong turn. She walked for a long distance but did not find her friends. Exhausted, she sat down under a tree, and soon fell asleep. She woke up when it was already dark. She was scared especially when she saw the lions that had surrounded her. Mulongo, who was to be eaten by the lions, managed to escape. Find out how she survived being eaten by the lions.
author: Mwesigwa Joshua Waswa

title: Namukhaywa
description: Namukhaywa nendvodza yakhe bane bantfwana  bemantfombatana laba sitfupa. Kantsi indvodza yakhe beyifuna indvodzana. Ngalesikhatsi Namukhaywa atfola emaphala, lentfombatane nelemfana, wancuma kufihla lentfombatane yesi-7 ayise lendvodzana yodvwa ekhaya  kumyeni wakhe. Lamaphahla akhula aphila imphilo yekwehlukana, kepha ngalelinye lilanga bahlangana. Ngabe balitfola liciniso?
author: Mlimi Prince Nhlanhla

title: Nͻbila La Katagune
description: Nͻbila la Katagune zͻtͻ wa yuum tari la zuo. Daarε diyima ti nͻbila suure dogε yese la sεla ti a iŋε ti bu ka doose ma'a.
author: Samuel Awinkene Atintono

title: Omukwano
description: Olugero lugema ku mwayi. Aye kiki akyaligho?
author: Mumbya Emmanuel

title: Kaza Da
description: Kaza da shanshani suna takara kullum tsakaninsu. Wata rana kaza da ba ta ci nasara ba,  ta yi wani abin kumya.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Kuhesabu Kabichi
description: Hadithi ya hisabati kuhusu kuhesabu na kugawanya. (Hadithi hii iliwezeshwa na ufadhili wa Oppenheimer Memorial Trust).
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Namukayya
description: Alboro fo kaŋ hay ize'way iddu. A ne wando se da a mana alboro hay kulu nga ga a fay. Waybora hay taway yaŋ: alboro fon da wayboro fo. Deeda caw ga faham.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Nayega eisomo
description: Omughala omuto ono eyayenda inho okutegera dhaadha we bw'ayengeka amenvu.
author: Victor  Muwanguzi

title: Ojua Pi Obau Be
description: This is a story of a young girl, Mulongo who went into the forest to meet her friends. However, she failed to find the path her friends had used. She took the wrong turn. She walked for a long distance but did not find her friends. Exhausted, she sat down under a tree, and soon fell asleep. She woke up when it was already dark. She was scared especially when she saw the lions that had surrounded her. Mulongo, who was to be eaten by the lions, managed to escape. Find out how she survived being eaten by the lions.
author: Saidi Omar Dramani

title: Omwayi
description: Inyanga ndala omwayi shiyali nende obunyasi bwokhulisia efiayo fie tawe.
author: Emily  Barasa

title: “Os Animais Cavam Um Poço”
description: A chuva não caiu por mais que um ano. Não havia nem uma gota de água. Como é que os animais possam resolver este problema?
author: Traditional Mozambican folktale

title: Me Kulo Kɛ Me Kenga
description: Ɛhye le adawu bie mɔɔ fane kakula nrenya bie mɔɔ ɔkulo adawu buluku ɛkengalɛ. ɔkulo adawu somaa mɔɔ ɔkulo kɛ ɔkenga ɔkile ye abusua ne a.
author: Henry Filby Gyane (OLE Ghana)

title: Isikhukukazi noKhozo lombona
description: Isikhukukazi noKhozo lombona banobuhlobo bokukhuphisana. Ngaminazana ithile isikhukukazi saba nomsindo kuba soyisiwe saze senza into esileyo kakhulu.
author: Kholeka Mabeta

title: Mulongo Ni Namuunyu
description: This is a story of a young girl, Mulongo who went into the forest to meet her friends. However, she failed to find the path her friends had used. She took the wrong turn. She walked for a long distance but did not find her friends. Exhausted, she sat down under a tree, and soon fell asleep. She woke up when it was already dark. She was scared especially when she saw the lions that had surrounded her. Mulongo, who was to be eaten by the lions, managed to escape. Find out how she survived being eaten by the lions.
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Nayega eisomo
description: Omughala omuto eyali ayenda einho okumanha nga era yekalirisa dhaadha ghe nga ayengeka amenvu.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Amaro Kisoma
description: Me stori ma mako kumi jiyachi ma thini mu maro kisoma storin. Omaro mateki ma go mito lewo gi family pere.
author: Faith Mariam Abbo

title: Okubala emboga
description: Olugero oluyigirizza okubala n'okugabana.(Obuyambi okuva mu Oppenheimer Memorial Trust bwebusoboseza akatabo kano okufuluma.).
author: Kisuule  Timothy

title: Developing your critical writing
description: This resource contains strategies for critical writing.

title: Taste Testing
description: This reading describes the sense of taste and the four different taste buds on the tongue. Questions follow the reading.

title: How to Count Atoms in a Chemical Formula and Chemical Equation
description: This resource teaches students how to count atoms in chemical formulas and equations.

title: Species Extinction - The Facts
description: This resource discusses the role humans play in species extinction.

title: Fractions: Multiplication
description: This worksheet gives students practice in multiplying fractions and decimals.

title: Reading and Writing Whole Numbers
description: This worksheet tests a student's ability to read and write whole numbers. Answer key is provided.

title: UNkukhu noSongololo
description: UNkukhu noSongololo babengabahlobo abathanda ukukhuphisana kakhulu. Ngenye imini uNkukhu wacatshukiswa kakhulu kukogqithwa wagqibela enze into ephambeneyo.
author: Xolisa Guzula

title: Mebala Ya Mola Wa Godimo
description: A o itse mebala ya mola wa godimo?

title: Ilmaisurîn Le Kokoô

author: Thabang Sibanyoni

title: Kubayini uYayeri alungile?
description: Kulendatjana sitjelwa ngomtwana olunge ngazo zoke iindlela. Umfundi ugqugquzeleke ngokuthi aqabange ngokuthi ngimiphi imikgwa nezenzo ezenza umuntu olungileko. UYayeri ulungile?
author: Ntuli

title: Imbuzi, Inja Nenkomo
description: Goat, Dog and Cow are good friends. They take a trip together on a taxi, but when the time comes to pay the driver one of the friends does something surprising. And as a result of what happened, each animal develops a different reaction to motor vehicles.
author: Ntswaki Vilane

title: Mke-mwenza mwenye wivu
description: Mke mwenye wivu anapanga kumwondosha mke-mwenza wake lakini anaelekea kubadili maisha kuwa bora zaidi kwao wote.
author: Brigid Simiyu
